title: Lovely One Bed Apartment in Lakeshore East! Visit Today!
map_address: East Waterside Dr near Harbor dr
posting_body: Introducing this building, a 37-story crystaline tower in the heart of Lakeshore East.
This apartment is situated in a resort-style urban oasis featuring an indoor lap pool, hydrotherapy pool and splash pad, along with an outdoor pool and tiered sunning lawn.
Multiple resident lounges make working from home comfortable, and with a jam room, maker’s space, golf simulator, indoor conservatory, and 32nd floor outdoor terrace, you’ll never have to leave home.

This amazing apartment rises above the easternmost parcel of the Lakeshore East neighborhood, where the Chicago River meets Lake Michigan and is the first rental residences to open in the community in nearly a decade.
One of Chicago’s best-kept secrets, Lakeshore East is a beautiful masterfully-planned community that’s just minutes from the bustling Loop.
At the gates of the building, residents will find the Park: 0.8 acres of dedicated greenspace with direct connection to the Lakefront and beaches.
Move East to where the city, the river, and the lake meet.
